General.Name: Shenzhen Shengxunda Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shen Zhen Shengxunda Technology Co.,Ltd engages in Internet content development activities in Thailand, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company is involved in game research and development, agency publishing, platform operation, and mobile application development activities. Shen Zhen Shengxunda Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Great China International ExchangeSquare, Shenzhen, China
